General.Name: IBI Inv House
General.Description: I.B.I Investment House Ltd. is a publicly owned holding investment firm with approximately NIS 11 billion ($2.63 billion) in assets under management. The firm provides its services to individuals and institutional clients. Through its subsidiaries, it provides securities trading and brokerage, financial consultancy, and investment management services. The firm manages investment portfolios, mutual fund, underwriting services, provident funds, and investments. It was formerly known as Gachelet Investment Co. I.B.I Investment House Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
